name: Bloody Tears and Jagged Smile
text: Your eyes turn black and weep blood, and your teeth become jagged fangs. You gain a bite attack (1d3 points of damage if you are Small, 1d4 points of damage if you are Medium). You gain a +4 profane bonus on Intimidate checks and on your spell DCs for spells with the fear descriptor. You perceive creatures as if using deathwatch.
range_zh: 个人 和 见文本
target_zh: 自身 或 见下文
text_zh: 你的眼睛变成黑色并哭出血泪，你的牙齿变成锯齿状的尖牙。你获得一次啮咬攻击（如果你是小体型造成1d3点伤害，如果你是中体型则造成1d4点伤害）。你在威吓检定和带有[恐惧]描述符的法术的法术DC上获得+4亵渎加值。你能感知生物就好像使用了观命术一样。
